headline: MRS. R.R. HOLLOWAY, CRUSADER, 78, DIES; Instrumental in Adoption by Congress of 'Star-Spangled Banner' as Anthem A FOE OF FOREIGN 'ISMS' Also Opposed Birth Control, Prohibition and Favored Oath for Teachers, Defense

headline: PROF. PEARL, NOTED AS BIOLOGIST, DEAD; Johns Hopkins Educator Who Made Study of Longevity Stricken on an Outing HOST TO PARTY OF FRIENDS Wrote Popular Books as Well as Scientific in His Field-- Received Many Honors Question That Fascinated Him Advocated Birth Control

headline: CANCELS EXHIBIT ON BIRTH CONTROL; Negro Exposition in Chicago Says Catholic Organizations Protested Against It MRS. SANGER INDIGNANT Sees a Fundamental Threat to Democracy in Pressure by Minority Church Group
snippet: CHICAGO, July 7--Claude Barnett, a member of the Exposition Authority, which is conducting the Negro exposition here, announced today that there would be no birth control exhibit at the exposition.

headline: BIRTH CONTROL FUND UP; $207,622 Raised in 43 States, Local Committee Reports

snippet: HARTFORD, Conn., March 20 (UP)--The State Supreme Court today upheld the Connecticut AntiBirth Control Law, which prohibits the use of contraceptives without exceptions, but in a companion decision ordered the return of contraceptives ...

headline: CHURCHMEN WARN LABOR ON 'RACKETS'; Back Collective-Bargaining Rights but Condemn Any 'Intimidation' by Unions BIRTH CONTROL FAVORED The Brooklyn Federation Also Reaffirms Its Censure of 'Christian Front'

headline: BIRTH CONTROL UNIT ASSAILED BY PRIEST; Father Fitzgerald Contends Speakers and Publicity Tried to Harm Church FALSE STAND IS CHARGED He Asserts That One Speaker Deliberately Misrepresented Basis for Opposition

headline: LEADERS AID DRIVE FOR BIRTH CONTROL; 1,000 Named on Committee to Sponsor a Campaign Throughout Nation MRS. SANGER IS CHAIRMAN Action Launched at Meeting at Which Mother of the President Is Guest
snippet: Birth control has gained the support of more than two score national leaders in medicine, business, education, civic affairs and in other fields for its first nation-wide campaign to extend and develop the movement of "planned parenthood."
